name: json-minifier
title: JSON Minifier
description: Minify JSON files by removing all unnecessary whitespace
content:
Overview

This application minifies JSON files by removing all unnecessary whitespace, reducing file size while maintaining valid JSON structure. Perfect for optimizing JSON data for transmission or storage.

Features

  • Validates JSON syntax before minification
  • Removes all whitespace and indentation
  • Preserves JSON data structure and values
  • Reports size reduction statistics

Parameters

  • Input JSON File: Upload your JSON file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the minified output

Output

The application generates a file named {original_name}_minified.json with all whitespace removed.

Use Cases

  • Reducing JSON file size for faster transmission
  • Optimizing API responses
  • Preparing JSON for production environments
  • Minimizing storage requirements for JSON data
